translation.You are attending a conference. Tap to o: You are attending a conference. Tap to open
translation.We need your permission so the microphon: We need your permission so the microphone can be shared.
translation.You joined as a listener due to the room: You joined as a listener due to the room's permissions policy.

translation.We need your permission so the webcam ca: We need your permission so the webcam can be shared.

translation.Would you like to leave your email for c: Would you like to leave your email for contact?
translation.We'd love to hear about your experience: We'd love to hear about your experience with the platform (optional).
translation.Wait for a moderator to approve your ent: Wait for a moderator to approve your entry
translation.You are the first in line!: You are the first in line!
translation.Your current position in the queue is:: Your current position in the queue is:
translation.Anonymous poll - presenter cannot see yo: Anonymous poll - presenter cannot see your answer
translation.Normal poll - presenter can see your ans: Normal poll - presenter can see your answer
translation.When the presenter posts a poll, it will: When the presenter posts a poll, it will appear here

translation.Attendee has an invalid session token be: Attendee has an invalid session token because they logged out
Attendee has an invalid session token because it was locked out
translation.Attendee inactive for a long time: Attendee inactive for a long time
translation.The session has reached the maximum numb: The session has reached the maximum number of participants
translation.Duplicate user trying to join the confer: Duplicate user trying to join the conference
translation.Removed from the conference due to a per: Removed from the conference due to a permission violation
translation.Guest waiting for a seat at the meeting: Guest waiting for a seat at the meeting
